T02rabhramu:9: iha bhāvanādhikṛto mantrī prātar utthāya hṛdayārkanyastanijabījaḥ kṛtamukhaśaucādiḥ
T02rabhramu:10: oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā
T02rabhramu:11: iti sthānātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādisurabhitāṃ dhyānabhūmiṃ praviśya,
T02rabhramu:14: hṛnmantrakiraṇākṛṣṭam abhimukham ākāśe saparivāraṃ bhagavantam avalokya,
T02rabhramu:15: hṛdbījanirgatābhir gauryādidevībhir aṣṭābhiḥ pūjayet. tatra gaurī śaśinaṃ bibharti,
T02rabhramu:22: ḍombī kaṇṭhalagnā puruṣāyate. tatas tasyaiva bhagavato 'grataḥ pāpadeśanādikam iti kuryāt -
T02rabhramu:24: sarvam ātmanaḥ pāpaṃ bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratideśayāmi,
T02rabhramu:26: sarvaṃ cātmanaḥ kuśalam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi. eṣo 'ham ā bodher
T02rabhramu:27: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam. dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi
T02rabhramu:28: samagraṃ mahāyānam. saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmy avaivartikabodhisattvagaṇam. aho batāham
T02rabhramu:29: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ abhisaṃbudheya sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya yāvad
T02rabhramu:30: atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe buddhabodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya. eṣo 'ham anuttaraṃ bodhimārgam
T02rabhramu:35: kleśapratipakṣamārgopasaṃhārākārām upekṣāṃ ca bhāvayet. tataḥ sarvadharmān manasālambya vicārayet ḥ cittam evaitat tena tenākāreṇa bhrāntaṃ pratibhāsate yathāsvapne.
T02rabhramu:37: nāsti cittād bāhyaṃ cittagrāhyam. grāhyābhāvāc cittam api grāhakaṃ na bhavati. tasmāc cittaśarīrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
T02rabhramu:38: teṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakaśūnyatā paramārtha iti. evam ekāntena niścitya bhrāntisamāropitaṃ
T02rabhramu:39: bhrānticihnaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ākāraṃ vihāya teṣāṃ prakṛtim eva kevalām advayavijñaptilakṣaṇāṃ
T02rabhramu:40: śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśāṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganopamām anantāṃ paśyet. idam ucyate
T02rabhramu:41: pāramārthikaṃ bodhicittaṃ lokottaraṃ śūnyatājñānaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirvikalpam. tatas
T02rabhramu:46: tatas tanniṣyandabhūtām ākāravatīṃ rakṣāṃ śuddhalaukikajñānasvabhāvāṃ bhāvayet.
T02rabhramu:47: repheṇa sūryaṃ purato vibhāvya tasmin ravau hūṃbhavaviśvavajram /
T02rabhramu:48: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayec ca prākārakaṃ pañjarabandhanaṃ ca //
T02rabhramu:52: adhastād vajramayīṃ bhūmim ārasātalaviracitāṃ paśyet. tato raviviśvavajrābhyāṃ raśmībhūya diśi diśi spharitvā ghanībhūya bahir dūre sīmābandhaḥ karaṇīya iti ślokārthaḥ.
T02rabhramu:53: tatas tanniṣyandatayaiva viśuddhāni pañca mahābhūtāni cintayet. tatrākāśamahābhūtaṃ
T02rabhramu:54: dharmodayākhyaṃ mahāvajradharasvabhāvaṃ śaracchaśadharadhavalam adhaḥ sūkṣmam upari
T02rabhramu:56: tadvedikāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni caturmaṇḍalākārāṇi caturdevīsvabhāvāny upary upari
T02rabhramu:57: paśyet. ādau laṃkāreṇa māhendramaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītaṃ koṇeṣu triśūkavajrāṅkam.
T02rabhramu:58: tato vaṃkāreṇa vāruṇaṃ vartulaṃ sitaṃ ghaṭāṅkam. tato raṃkāreṇāgneyaṃ trikoṇaṃ raktaṃ
T02rabhramu:59: koṇeṣu rephāṅkam. tato yaṃkāreṇa vāyavyaṃ dhanurākāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ koṭidvaye calatpatākāṅkam.
T02rabhramu:60: bhāvakas tu tadānīṃ tad eva lokottarajñānaṃ (BhrHe 161)
T02rabhramu:61: vyāpakatvena sthitam. tato viśvavajravedikāmadhye caturmahābhūtapariṇāmajaṃ pariśuddhabuddhakṣetrasaṃkṣeparūpaṃ
T02rabhramu:62: mahāmokṣapuraṃ vairocanasvabhāvaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāram aṣṭābhiḥ śmaśānaiḥ sarvalokadhātunairātmyasūcakaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dhyāyāt.
T02rabhramu:68: paramaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmair upahāraiś ca harṣaṇam //
T02rabhramu:75: tatra madhyāsanasyopari pañcadaśabhiḥ svaraiś candramaṇḍalam ādarśajñānasvabhāvam,
T02rabhramu:78: karttikapālau saṃyuktau svabījamadhyagatau pratyavekṣaṇājñānātmakau cintayet. tato bījadvayād yoginīcakrākāreṇa sarvatathāgatān saṃsphārya,
T02rabhramu:85: jvalad bījadvayaṃ rāgāt padmāntaḥ praviśad dravet //
T02rabhramu:86: tato vajrī mahārāgād vilīya saha vidyayā /
T02rabhramu:90: uṭṭha bharāḍo karuṇamaṇu pukkasi mahuṃ paritāhi /
T02rabhramu:93: tojjha vihuṇṇe marami haüṃ uṭṭhahi tuhuṃ hevajja /
T02rabhramu:95: loa nimantia suraapahu suṇṇe acchasi kīsa /
T02rabhramu:96: haüṃ caṇḍālī viṇṇamami taï viṇu uhami na dīsa //
T02rabhramu:97: indīālī uṭṭha tuhuṃ haüṃ jāṇami tuhu citta /
T02rabhramu:98: aṃhe ḍombī cchea maṇu mā karu karuṇavicchitta //
T02rabhramu:99: atha gītikānurodhāc candradravasaṃhārajābhyāṃ tatkālajaravimaṇḍalasthitābhyām aṃkārahūṃkārābhyāṃ devatānāṃ cihnadehādikam ākāśopamaṃ māyopamaṃ ca niścitya,
T02rabhramu:100: tatpariṇāmayoḥ karttikapālayoḥ saṃyuktayor dṛḍhasamādhirūpayor garbhe tad eva
T02rabhramu:101: (BhrHe 164) bījadvayaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānasvabhāvaṃ paśyet. tata eva spharaṇayogena
T02rabhramu:102: yoginīcakrākārānantatathāgatamayaṃ cittādhīnaṃ ca viśvaṃ nirūpya saṃharaṇayogena
T02rabhramu:103: sarvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ gaganopamaṃ ca parijñāya dvitīyaravicihnabījapariṇāmajaṃ śrīherukam ātmānaṃ paśyet.
T02rabhramu:118: cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhā ca haste rucaka mekhalam //
T02rabhramu:121: pṛthivī varuṇa vāyuś ca tejaś candrārka eva ca /
T02rabhramu:126: bhagavatyās tu hṛccandrasthitakarttimuṣṭicandre aṃkāraṃ cintayet. tato 'sya śrotre nairātmyām,
T02rabhramu:131: manasi nairātmyām adhimuñcet. etad eva vajrādipañcakaṃ yathākramaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskandheṣu,
T02rabhramu:132: tathā mohamātsaryarāgerṣyādveṣeṣu. rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāyataneṣu bāhyagaurī caurī vettālī ghasmarī bhūcarī khecarī,
T02rabhramu:140: asthiṣu satyacatuṣṭayam. evaṃ devatābhiḥ sakalīkṛtya tadaparāḥ śuddhīr adhimuñcet.
T02rabhramu:143: mukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣās tu tribhis tattvais trilocanaḥ /
T02rabhramu:144: pañca mudrā jināḥ pañca kruddho duṣṭānuśāsanam //
T02rabhramu:150: tadanu svahṛdbījaraśmispharaṇāṅkuśair daśadiggatāṃs tathāgatān ākṛṣya nabhasi saṃsthāpya tān aṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjya
T02rabhramu:152: iti prārthayet. taiḥ śrīherukarūpāpannaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtapañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśair abhiṣicyate. abhiṣicyamānasya śirasi bhagavān akṣobhya
T02rabhramu:161: caturānandabhāg viśva hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
T02rabhramu:165: khagamukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
T02rabhramu:168: iti ratim ārabhet. tataḥ kamalodarapatitacandradravabindupariṇāmena gaṃkāreṇa niṣpannāṃ
T02rabhramu:169: gaurīṃ kṛṣṇavarṇāṃ karttirohitadharāṃ pūrvadvārāsanacandre cintayet. tathā caṃkāreṇa
T02rabhramu:171: tathā vaṃkāreṇa vettālīṃ kanakavarṇāṃ kūrmakapāladharāṃ paścimadvārāsanacandre,
T02rabhramu:172: tathā ghaṃkāreṇa ghasmarīṃ maraktābhām. bhujagayogapātrīdharām uttaradvārāsanacandre,
T02rabhramu:173: tathā paṃkāreṇa pukkasīm indranīlanibhāṃ keśariparśudharāṃ aiśānakoṇāsanacandre,
T02rabhramu:174: tathā śaṃkāreṇa śabarīṃ candrakāntanibhāṃ bhikṣukhikkhirikādharām āgneyakoṇāsanacandre, (BhrHe 169)
T02rabhramu:175: tathā laṃkāreṇa caṇḍālīṃ nabhaḥśyāmāṃ cakralāṅgaladharāṃ naiṛtikoṇāsanacandre,
T02rabhramu:176: tathā ḍaṃkāreṇa ḍombīṃ karburavarṇāṃ vajratarjanikādharāṃ vāyavyakoṇāsanacandre dhyāyāt.
T02rabhramu:179: atha parito niṣpannaṃ maṇḍalam avalokya hṛdbījakiraṇāṅkuśair jñānamaṇḍalam ākṛṣya,
T02rabhramu:186: hṛnmantrakiraṇaiḥ sarvatathāgatān ākṛṣya saṃpūjya prārthya tayor abhiṣekaṃ dāpayet. abhiṣicyamānānām abhiṣekajinaḥ śirasi jāyate. atra ślokau:
T02rabhramu:187: pukkasyādyāś catasras tu gauryādyāś ca yathākramam /
T02rabhramu:192: tato devatātattvaṃ manasikuryāt. iha sarvadharmāḥ kāyavākcittajñānaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ.
T02rabhramu:193: teṣāṃ kāyādīnāṃ yā dharmatā vijñaptimātratā dvayaśūnyatā tasyāḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ yathāyogaṃ
T02rabhramu:194: dvārapālīnāṃ tattvam. tasyā eva śūnyatāyāḥ samyagjñānaṃ niṣprapañcam anāsravā prajñā
T02rabhramu:195: vajrayānam anuttaraṃ yathāyogaṃ pukkasyādīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ tattvam. tasyaiva vajrayānasya
T02rabhramu:196: phalaṃ mahāvajradharapadaṃ niruttarā bodhir maṇḍalādhipates tattvam.
T02rabhramu:197: tataḥ svahṛdbījād aṣṭau pūjādevīḥ saṃsphārya tāsāṃ spharaṇameghair gaganam āpūrya sanāyakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pūjayet. tato māyopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya gītidvayena bhagavantaṃ stūyāt.
T02rabhramu:212: tajjñānabījebhyas tair eva kiraṇair ākṛṣya jñānāmṛtaṃ teṣu saṃpātya samarasīkuryāt. evaṃ tāny amṛtīkṛtya tryakṣareṇādhiṣṭhāya hūṃkāreṇa jihvāyāṃ
T02rabhramu:214: tair amṛtair ātmānaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca saṃtarpayet.
T02rabhramu:215: mātṛcakre pure ramye bhāvayed īdṛśaṃ prabhum /
T02rabhramu:220: tato gaurīṃ caurīṃ yāvan maṇḍalādhipatiṃ pratyekam anupūrvyā daśasu dikṣu nirantaraṃ saṃsphārya,
T02rabhramu:223: kṛtakṛtyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍalādhipatiṃ ca niṣprapañcasukhasamarpitaṃ paśyet. tatra gaurī kāyasya bhūtapratyavekṣāyāṃ sattvān vyavasthāpayati,
T02rabhramu:230: ḍombī jñānasya. maṇḍaleśvaras tu mahāvajradharapade sattvān avasthāpayati.
T02rabhramu:232: kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ tataḥ pītaṃ harin nīlaṃ sitaṃ kramāt /
T02rabhramu:236: ca kāyaḥ. bhāvanākhinno mantraṃ japet. samaṇḍalam ātmānaṃ devatārūpeṇāvirbhūtaṃ vicintya
T02rabhramu:237: oṃ deva picuvajra hūṃ 3 phaṭ svāhā
T02rabhramu:238: iti hṛtsūrye trayodaśa mantrākṣarāṇy ūrdhvaśiraskāni pradīpavaj jvalanti maṇḍalībhūtāni manasābhilikhya,
T02rabhramu:239: tāny eva vācayan vajravācā krodhavācā vā japet. sarvamukhebhyaḥ sarvadevīmukhebhyaś
T02rabhramu:240: ca mantram uccarantam adhimuñcet. iyataiva svadevatāyā aṣṭaguṇo jāpaḥ sarvadevīnāṃ
T02rabhramu:244: ebhir labheya kuśalair lambhayeyaṃ ca taj jagat //
T02rabhramu:245: caryā saṃbodhaye yā ca saṃbuddhānāṃ ca yā punaḥ /
T02rabhramu:246: varṇitā bodhivajreṇa sā caryāstu dvayī mama //
T02rabhramu:251: hevajrāhaṃkareṇotthāya tathaiva viharet. madhyāhnapradoṣasandhyayor dhyānagṛhaṃ praviśya pūrvavad ādhāramaṇḍalaṃ tanmadhyāsane cātmānaṃ samāpannāṣṭānanahevajrarūpaṃ jhaṭiti dṛṣṭvā,
T02rabhramu:254: pūjāstutyamṛtāsvādaṃ jāpādikaṃ ca kuryāt. nidrākāle ṣaḍaṅgayogaṃ sahajānandayogaṃ
T02rabhramu:255: vābhimukhīkṛtya supyāt. caturdevīgītisaṃcoditaś ca nidrāta uttiṣṭhet. utthāya sarvaṃ
T02rabhramu:256: pūrvavat kuryāt. evaṃ pratyahaṃ yāvat siddhinimittāni paśyati. tāni dṛṣṭvā yathātantram
T02rabhramu:261: kuśalam idam avāptaṃ yan mayā janmabhājāṃ niravadhihitahetus tena vajrī jinaḥ syām //
